message: I propose we divide the $10000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This allows both of us to share a fair portion while accounting for the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair split considering the value of money is decreasing at different rates for us.
